name: Get Word
description:
The game is free, takes up little memory and works without the Internet!

Get Word is an exciting multi-level word game. It is very similar to Wordle, the game that took the internet by storm. Wordle is the mobile version of the old TV show Lingo. You have 6 tries to find the word, but don't worry, we'll tell you which letter you guessed right and which one you got right. The game has a hidden word that you need to pick up in a few attempts.

★ NO REGISTRATION

Just play! The game is available for all types of Android devices. Works without internet!

Our mail to contact us: uralproapps@gmail.com
